title: AnnaiyargaL vanam nADi vandAr
sahitya:
annaiyargaL vanam nADi vandAr annam shumandu koNDO�Di vandanarE kaNNan vazhiyinaiyE nADi


anupallavi

  munnait-tavamellAm valiya ingE munnaittanavO allAl tinaittanavO 
ennE en nanjamE�..unak-kiduvaraiyElum edu pozhudEnum sukhamidu pOlum aridena nADi


caraNam    paimpunal vAvi shUzh shOlattaDam engum tan�.gi pangaiyak-
kaNNanai angayark-kaNgaLum nOkkudE inbam shErkkudE
tenpaDu taTamengum malarnda naru malarAnadu manam aLLa 
tIn-kuzhalUdiDum mAdhavanarugum tenpaDum enriru padam tuLLa 
oru karam melinda tanjumAna maTroru karam annak-kalam koLLa 
OhO idai ennavenru sholla uttaman vazhiyinaik-kaNDu meLLa meLLa
